title: No children node listing when changing data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab
OB: When changing the data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab, the children nodes are not listed.
EB: The expected result is that when changing the data source, the new data source's children should be listed out.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the data set editor page in the query tab. 
2. Change the data source for a data set. 
3. Check if the children nodes of the new data source are listed out.
